s.text: Some-times our clients are not the most agreeable in the world, but this year when I put out forms asking for pro bono work, they started coming back by fax almost immediately."
Some-times our clients are not the most agreeable in the world, but this year when I put out forms asking for pro bono work, they started coming back by fax almost immediately."
We cannot bring class-action suits, and we cannot ask for attorney's fees when we win a case.

While the will to assist the low income population has not abated in Northern Colorado, those involved with federally funded legal services must wait to see who President Bush appoints to the board of the Legal Services Corp.
The work by the Larimer County Bar Association has been going on for 18 years, and in that time several thousand clients have been served.
The work by the Larimer County Bar Association has been going on for 18 years, and in that time several thousand clients have been served.
The work by the Larimer County Bar Association has been going on for 18 years, and in that time several thousand clients have been served.

However, the 1998 Report of the Legal Services/Pre Bono Committee, of the Judicial Advisory Council found that the ability of low- and middle-income Coloradans to obtain equal access to the legal system has been limited by the number of lawyers available and willing to serve them and by the growing complexity of the law.
She attributes part of this increase to the fact that people have been moving to Colorado in hopes of finding the promised land, as outlined in Money Magazine.
